name: Trouble in Suburbia
description:
-Move with WASD

-Jump with Space

-Fire your weapon with Left Mouse Button

-Use your thrusters with F for a quick escape

If the aliens touch you, you will lose health. Keep moving, and refresh the page in the event of a game over.

This game uses these sounds from Freesound:

"Loopable hum" by user Patrick_Corra (https://freesound.org/people/Patrick_Corra/sounds/466451/)

"Suburb Park Ambiance" by user CheneWessels_170017 (https://freesound.org/people/CheneWessels_170017/sounds/407610/)

"Laser" by user Daleonfire (https://freesound.org/people/Daleonfire/sounds/376694/)
